text:
<!here|@here> Joel and I just met to go over the ‘launch sprint’.  

*What does done look like?* Deliver arduino to ADX.  Spend 1-2 hours helping them install it.  Leave behind 1 pager.  Firmware needs to handle payment and all permutations; trigger photobooth software.  TESTING AND FINAL DEPLOYMENT ARE OUT OF SCOPE.  I’ll share this understanding with Henry later today when I have the rest of the input I need from ya’ll.  

The plan:
- *Today by 4pm:* <@U02E3CRMA> and <@U0EL0GLEL> to list out remaining tasks.  Estimate them
- We’ll clear availability and plan a sprint.  
- I’ll share this plan and scope with Henry by EOD.  We’ll then hold ourselves to this delivery date
<@U02E3CRMA> and <@U0EL0GLEL> it’s 2:30, how we looking for 4pm?
